How Teamwork Activity Works:

System Overview

Admin controls for managing the system.

Universal Flashcard Game Assets

Configure images and sounds that apply to ALL flashcard games. These are used unless a specific flashcard set has its own assets.

How Game Assets Work

  • Start Image/Sound - Shows when the game begins
  • Progress Image + 4 Sounds - Shows after each correct answer (1st-4th)
  • Perfect Image/Sound - Shows when all 5 words in a set are correct (100%)
  • Almost Image/Sound - Shows when a set is finished but not perfect
  • Timeout Image/Sound - Shows when the timer runs out
  • End GIFs + Sounds - Shows at game completion based on final score

Game Start

Image and sound shown when the game begins

Progress Rewards (1st-4th Correct)

Same image shown for each correct answer, different sound for each position

Perfect Score (5/5 in a Set)

Shows when player gets all 5 words correct in a single set

Almost Perfect (Set Complete, Not 100%)

Shows when a set is finished but player missed some words

Timeout (Timer Ran Out)

Shows when the timer runs out on a word

End Game Results (6 Tiers by Score)

Different GIFs shown at game end based on final percentage

Current Universal Assets

Loading current assets...

Walk Away Mode Settings

Configure sounds for Walk Away Mode. This allows students to practice flashcards hands-free with audio cues.

How Walk Away Mode Works

  • English word is spoken aloud when each card appears
  • Student says the Korean translation
  • Wrong sound plays if answer is incorrect (student can try again)
  • Time's up sound plays when timer expires, then correct answer is spoken
  • Correct sound plays when answer is right

Wrong Answer Sound

Plays when student says incorrect answer (they can try again)

Time's Up Sound

Plays when timer runs out, before showing correct answer

Correct Answer Sound

Plays when student answers correctly

Play Again Sound (Flashcard Games)

Plays after all flashcards complete - "Do you want to play again?"
